title: Draymond Green on Tristan Thompson: 'I Can Meet Him in the Streets Any Day'
content: Shortly after  Cleveland Cavaliers  center Tristan Thompson was ejected from Game 1 of the NBA Finals, he gestured toward  Draymond Green  and told the  Golden State Warriors  forward to meet him outside...   from Bleacher Report - NBA https://ift.tt/2J8XSFq  via IFTTT
